poem:
"Palette of Triumph"

Through the purple pulse of adversity's vein,
Sugar-spun stories dissolve pain.
Nests of strength in sisterhood's reign,
Kinship inks softens the hard-gotten gain.

Original barbs lose to the movie-musical strain,
A power-cast orchestra dulls the raw refrain.
Yet within the softened blow, may strength retain. 
In every note, every frame, let triumph remain.
